sentences: In its conclusions (FCCC/SBI/2010/L.5), the SBI, inter alia : invites parties to provide financial resources for the organization of thematic regional workshops and for the full-scale implementation of the information network clearing house (CC:iNet); endorses the terms of reference for the intermediate review of progress in the implementation of the New Delhi work programme, as contained in the annex to the conclusions; and invites submissions by 16 August 2010, on information and views that may be relevant to the completion of the intermediate review.
